reviews.review_text: it is a fun game but scary to i played for a while and i love it it is worth the money

The intro is longer than the actual game, human doggos turn into real people when you bash them with a ♥♥♥♥ING LEAD PIPE  11/10 would play and waste my time again :D:D:D:D:D:D::D:D:D::DD:D::D:DD:DD: (kill me)
